txt.en: 'We must ready ourselves for battle, [placeholder]. According to these battle plans you stole, they are nearly upon us, and in great numbers.\n\n'I am not afraid! My sword is ready....'
'You fought courageously, and I would be proud to fight by your side any day. Thank you for helping to keep this Mead Hall from falling, and sparing us all from certain doom.'
'They will be here any moment now. Please help me keep my mother and this Mead Hall safe. We must prepare for battle, or be overrun!'
Floodwend's peril has come to a boil. The Orcs and Easterlings have advanced on Floodwend, lead by the Nazgûl: the Grim Southron.
Help Radwig defend the Mead Hall
The town of Floodwend is besieged by the forces of Jóshkhin Orda, led by the Grim Southron who re-grouped the routed army. You must protect the Mead Hall, and the young Thane of Floodwend!
The Mead Hall was saved in the assault on Floodwend, but the town has taken its losses.\n\nThe enemy has been routed! But will they return?
